name: Yet Another MDR
description:
Fight mutated enemies in a randomly generated dungeon while gathering               seeds and new weapons in the game Yet Another MDR                                   (Metroidvania, Dungeon Crawler, Roguelike).

This game was made as a school project, and it's purpose is to show off features such as random dungeon generation, fluid player movement and challenging combat. We were experimenting with many different genres, hence the name MDR (Metroidvania, Dungeon Crawler and Roguelike). Feel free to try it out and give feedback, but keep in mind that it's a prototype.
